Name: Heavy Rescue: 401
Title: Big, Mean and Heavy
Desc: A load of lumber spills across the 401 in the heart of Toronto, John Allen heads into the storm.
LongDescription: A load of lumber spills across the 401 in the heart of Toronto, John Allen heads into the first storm of the season; after an injury on the job, Gary must lean on Collin for a heavy yet delicate recovery; Sonny makes a major change in his life.
